pbjs.que.push(function() { pbjs.addAdUnits(adUnits); pbjs.bidderSettings = { standard: { adserverTargeting: [{ key: 'hb_bidder', val: function(bidResponse) { return bidResponse.bidderCode; } }, { key: 'hb_adid', val: function(bidResponse) { return bidResponse.adId; } }, { key: 'hb_pb', val: function(bidResponse) { var cpm = bidResponse.cpm; if (cpm < 3.00) { return (Math.floor(cpm * 20) / 20).toFixed(2); } else if (cpm < 7.00) { return (Math.floor(cpm * 10) / 10).toFixed(2); } else if (cpm < 30.00) { return (Math.floor(cpm)).toFixed(2); } else { return '30.00'; } } }] }, appnexus: { bidCpmAdjustment: function(bidCpm){ return bidCpm * 1.3; } }, districtmDMX: { bidCpmAdjustment: function(bidCpm){ return bidCpm * 1.15; } }, indexExchange: { bidCpmAdjustment: function(bidCpm){ return bidCpm * 1.3; } }, pulsepoint: { bidCpmAdjustment: function(bidCpm){ return bidCpm * 1.3; } }, sovrn: { bidCpmAdjustment: function(bidCpm){ return bidCpm * 1.3; } } }; pbjs.setConfig({ bidderSequence: "fixed" }); pbjs.requestBids({ adUnitCodes: adUnitCodes, bidsBackHandler: sendAdserverRequest }); });

function sendAdserverRequest() { if (pbjs.adserverRequestSent) return; pbjs.adserverRequestSent = true; googletag.cmd.push(function() { pbjs.que.push(function() { pbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync(); googletag.pubads().refresh(); }); }); }
